website_summaries.verdict: A vintage armchair built more for style than comfort, but it breaks in with use.
pros: Includes ottoman for resting your feet
Petite chair that will easily fit in a corner of the room
cons: Not as comfortable initially, but softens up with time

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: With a fabric that has our last name in the print, how could I not purchase?! Was very pleased with the quality. While a small chair, it is still suitable for my 6 ft husband. Perfect little reading chair, and the ottoman is a added plus.
customer_reviews.author: cgm

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and cute for bedroom
customer_reviews.text: Great bedroom chair and ottoman. Looks wonderful in my newly decorated bedroom. Unlike some reviews said , this set is perfectly sized for a bedroom corner or an apartment living room. I am 5”5’ and when seated it hits the bend of my knees and is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cook

customer_reviews.title: I should have paid closer attention to the dementions...
customer_reviews.text: The chair was smaller than expected. I purchased it to go in my BLK/wht bedroom. It was too small for my King Size bed. He was a great accent to my 7 year old granddaughter's Paris themed bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: This chair had a weak closure strap
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this chair to take to events with stadium seating. After just 6 uses, this chairs Velcro closing strap broke loose from the bottom, making it impossible to carry the chair using the back straps as it falls open. I have another chair identical to this one purchased from a marine shop, I have used that chair for almost a year with no issues. I am not sure if this chair was a factory second, as it did not state that when purchased
customer_reviews.author: linsan3579

customer_reviews.title: Great for small apartment or dorm
customer_reviews.text: Fits really well in my small apartment. Would be ideal for a dorm room as well. I’m 5’3 and it is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: SMW

customer_reviews.title: Doll Furniture!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible chair, looks like doll furniture and not for the average sized person. I returned it, but had to pay $25.00 for FEDEX ship it back! The sellar declined to pay it, so I did get most of the money back. Poor customer satisfaction because the chair was not right for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The perfect reading chair
customer_reviews.text: This is adorable!! It’s gonna be a cute corner reading chair. I picked out a very cute standing corner lamp and a nice fluffy blanket. Perfect for a young ladies room.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly C.

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: This chair is for very very petite man. My son couldn’t even sit. Extremely small I wouldn’t buy anything from this company when I wanted to return they charged me 20% restocking fee. Never again.
customer_reviews.author: Bobo

customer_reviews.title: Also is easy to store
customer_reviews.text: Got for my son play video games and he loved it
customer_reviews.author: eliane

customer_reviews.title: Measurements different than stated
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy when we opened the box and saw how small the chair was. We had measured the height described against another chair before ordering. This is fine maybe for a child but certainly not for adult size.
customer_reviews.author: rk

customer_reviews.title: To small
customer_reviews.text: Was smaller than I expected. Would not have bought it if I knew it was as small as it was
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really small
customer_reviews.text: This chair is really small. Looks like a child's chair. Not what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Holgate

customer_reviews.title: Nice chair nice price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. It looks beautiful in person. Not for y’all people.
customer_reviews.author: Niel

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a kids chair.
customer_reviews.text: Accent in bedroom. I didn’t read the description close enough. It’s REALLY small.
customer_reviews.author: Susan D. Bachinski

customer_reviews.title: Accent chair
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Goes great in my smaller newly decorated bedroom!
customer_reviews.author: GERALDINE

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for all day wrestling tournaments. It works perfectly. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: They are fine, worked for why we bought them, just wish they were a bit higher.
customer_reviews.author: safarinut

customer_reviews.title: Très Chic!
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect little reading chair, nook chair, bedroom chair, any smallish space. As others have commented, it is indeed a small chair so measure the seat cushion against your backside to make sure it’s a fit, but my husband and I both find it pretty comfortable for an hour or two, especially with a small pillow for lumbar support. The tiny ottoman is adorable. We have the French Script fabric and it’s just charming.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money way too small
customer_reviews.text: This chair is not for adults. This is a CHILDREN'S CHAIR. I WAS VERY DISAPPOINTED. IT WAS 1 WEEK LATE AND IT WAS TOO SMALL. PLEASE DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY OR TIME ORDERING THIS CHAIR UNLESS ITS FOR SOME CHILDREN.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Forte

customer_reviews.title: Chair legs not in box
customer_reviews.text: This chair is the right size for me at 5’4”. I was excited to receive it and give a a 5 star. Unfortunately, I only received 2 legs for the chair. I sent communication to the seller and hope to get the other 2 legs ASAP. Really wanted to rate higher......
customer_reviews.author: V. Sandarusi

customer_reviews.title: East to assemble  cushions way too hard - uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Needed another living room chair, really nice to look at but cushion is uncomfortably hard.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara K

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy from Giantex!!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product or from the company Giantex!!! Product: the accent chair is really small and very uncomfortable. The company, Giantex: very difficult to work with especially when you’re trying to return something. Total nightmare!
customer_reviews.author: alejandria tomas

product_meta.title: Giantex Accent Chair with Ottoman, Modern Upholstered Barrel Accent Chair Furniture Set, Linen Fabric, Soft Sponge, Firm Wood Frame, w/High Arms and Deep Seat, Ideal for Living Room, Bedroom, Garret
product_meta.description:
Description:

Have you ever expect to havea entirely relax time after the busy work? Do you want to have a personal sofato enjoy your nap? You may need a sofa like our product.

Our accent chair with ottomanis your best choice for relaxation and rest. With the high density sponges andlinen fabric material, our seat can keep its perfect shape without collapse.And the softy is also promised. You can do lounging, reading, working, ornapping on the adorable chair. The wood frame makes it sturdy enough to holdyou and keep your safe! You may not need to worry about the stability of thechair at all. We have the human body mechanics design to providing you muchcomfort. By the simple but modern design, it can also delight your house! Soconvenient and adorable right? Why not take it home right now?



Features:

Simple and modern design candecorate your bedroom or living room more stylish

The ottoman can be used as afootrest, a separate seat or a tea table.

With human mechanics design,support your back and cure your tiredness. 

Soft armrest for you to relaxthe muscle of neck and shoulder

Padded with high -qualitysponge, make you feel soft and comfortable

Breathable linen fabricprovides a pleasant and clean seat

Constructed with wood frame,keeps the stability and durability



Specifications:

Color: Beige/Black

Material: Wood Frame, Sponge,Linen Fabric, Plastic

Net Weight: 25.5 lbs

Weight Capacity : 441 lbs

Chair Size: 25'' x 25'' x 27'' (L x W x H) 

Ottoman Size: 16'' x 16'' x 14'' (L x W x H)

Cushion Size: 17'' x 19''(L x D) 

Leg Height: 5.5"



Package Includes:

1 x Accent Chair 1 x Ottoman 1 x Instruction
feature_bullets: 【Multifunctional Use】: Our accent chair is matching an ottoman so you do not need to buy another footrest to match it. If necessary, you can take the ottoman as a small seat to better entertain your friend. It can also be used as a tea table alone, so you can put your computer, books, snacks and other items.

【Make You Feel Comfortable and Relaxing】: The seat cushion is padded with high-quality sponge, which will provide you a soft and cozy feeling. The material of the surface is made by the linen fabric, which is breathable and environmental friendly. Even after a long-time use, it would not get any bad smell but keep its neat and soft.

【Firm Wood Frame】: Compared with other production, our chair is constructed with wood frame, which is combined with stability and durability. We can promise that our chair is sturdy enough to support the very strong adult in a breeze. It is a ideal furniture for you to lounge, work on your laptop, watch TV, play games and read books.

【Ergonomic Design】: Our accent chair follows the human body mechanics principle design strictly. The curved backrest can better suit your back and give you a back-rub. The armrests help you to smooth weary muscles of neck and shoulder. With an ottoman, you can kick up your feet and enjoy a relax time.

【Perfectly Match with Your House】: Our product is designed with a small size. It is convenient for you to put it on any places like bedroom, living room, baby room, office room, garret or balcony. With simple design, the chair can coordinate with all kinds of decoration styles. And the special British style works well in delighting your house decor.
